title: House for Sale in Pelawatta
details:
REF NO: HFS0100

Beautiful House for Sale in Pelawatta

- Unfurnished
- 10 perches
- 3700 sqft
- 4 Bedrooms (air conditioned)
- Master Bedroom with walk in closet
- 4 Bathrooms (hot water available)
- Living and Dinning
- Kitchen with pantry
- Wet kitchen
- Maids room and Washroom
- TV room with a space for a bar
- Spacious living room upstairs
- CCTV available
- 3 Phase electricity
- 2 car parks
- Solidly built
- High quality fittings


Price of the property - LKR 71 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee


Inspections with prior appointments
